name: Return the Credit Card Ledger for a Credit Card Number

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930709001770"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1
When I search for a Credit Card Ledger with Credit Card Number 4966625660004688
Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following Credit Card Ledger transactions
| lineNum | datePosted | narrative | amountvalue | amountsign |
| 0001 | 2015-08-14 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 83.24 | CR |
| 0002 | 2015-09-15 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 80.74 | CR |
| 0003 | 2015-10-15 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 78.32 | CR |
| 0004 | 2015-11-13 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 75.97 | CR |
| 0005 | 2015-12-07 | PAYMENT THANK YOU | 20.00 | CR |
| 0006 | 2015-12-15 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 73.09 | CR |
| 0007 | 2016-01-15 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 70.89 | CR |
| 0008 | 2016-02-15 | DIRECT DEBIT - THANK | 68.77 | CR |
